sources.title: The Mystery Train
sources.description: Title: The Mystery Train Summary: A group of passengers are trapped in a runaway Pullman car. Directed by: Phil Whitman Actors: Hedda Hopper, Marceline Day, Nick Stuart Production Company: Continental Talking Pictures Release Date: 1 August 1931 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A group of passengers are trapped in a runaway Pullman car.

sources.title: The Mystery Train
sources.description: A group of passengers are trapped in a runaway Pullman car.

sources.title: The Mystery Train (1931) HEDDA HOPPER
sources.description:
Stars: Hedda Hopper, Marceline Day, Nick Stuart 
Director: Phil Whitman

 When the train taking her to prison is wrecked, a woman unjustly convicted of theft is sheltered by a society woman and her lawyer. What could be the motive of these mysterious new friends?

metadata.Plot: A group of passengers is trapped in a runaway Pullman car.
metadata.Actors: Hedda Hopper, Marceline Day, Nick Stuart
